context_of_use: This use case allows power users and managers to perform bulk operations and configure system settings within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: Efficient handling of bulk operations
description: Enables power users and managers to perform bulk operations and configure system settings.
triggering_event: Power user or manager initiates a configuration action.
preconditions: User is authenticated as a power user or manager.
assumptions: The user has the necessary permissions to configure system settings and handle bulk operations.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to handle bulk operations.
The system shall permit managers to configure system settings.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on specific system settings that can be configured.
main_flow: 1. power user → System displays bulk operation options.
2. power user selects bulk operation → System processes the selected operation.
4. manager selects settings to configure → System applies the configuration.
